author: xtqqczze
body:
Search and replace `private class` -> `private sealed class`.

* Fix [CS0509: Cannot derive from sealed type](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/csharp/misc/cs0509)
* Fix [CS0628: New protected member declared in sealed class](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/csharp/misc/cs0628)

_Contributes to #15110._

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: CodeFactor new "complex method" issues are false positives, see #15721.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:

title: Seal private classes
